subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With 23 turnovers that the Bucks turned into 30 points, Friday’s game was far from the free-wheeling, quick-shooting basketball that Mike D’Antoni has tried to drum into the Knicks.
snippet: With 23 turnovers that the Bucks turned into 30 points, Friday’s game was far from the free-wheeling, quick-shooting basketball that Mike D’Antoni has tried to drum into the Knicks.
